issue.title: [JS] Investigate using Symbols to access Row columns by index
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4551](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4551). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Can we use row[Symbol.for(0)] instead of row[0] in order to avoid collisions? What would the performance impact be?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4551?focusedCommentId=17523973) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Is this still an issue and can you explain what the benefits would be?
